## The Only Game in Town

This presentation introduces stock markets from the perspective of the famous paper *The Only Game in Town* by Walter Bagehot[footnote: this is a pseudonym.  the real Walter Bagehot wrote 'On Lombard Street: The History of the Money Markets [check exact title]'.

-  This paper is credited as being a seminal paper in Market Microstructure.


##  Market Participants

There are 3 types of market participants.

-  The Market Maker

-  Informed Traders

-  Noise Traders
